word_mean: 围产期的，产期的：生产前后不久的

sentence.Network_en: Premature birth is the main cause of perinatal mortality.
sentence.Network_cn: 早产是临产死亡的主要原因。

sentence.Network_en: The Apgar score ≤7 and neonate death were studied as perinatal outcome.
sentence.Network_cn: 将新生儿Apgar评分≤7分和围产儿死亡作为围产结局指标.

sentence.Network_en: Deep understanding and management of polyhydramnios is helpful to improve perinatal outcomes.
sentence.Network_cn: 对羊水过多正确的认识和处理有助于改善围产期结局.

entry.def: Perinatal deaths, problems, or experiences happen at the time of birth or soon after the time of birth.

example.ex: Premature birth is the main cause of perinatal mortality.
example.tran: 早产是临产死亡的主要原因。

means.word_mean: 1. occurring during the period around birth (5 months before and 1 month after);
